name: Eye-Friendly Google (Google Gray UI)
description:
You feel "Google's white background is dazzling...!" don't you? We supply you with pale-coloring-userstyle.
We'd be glad if your eye strain is removed!

Googleの白背景が眩しい・・・！という日々Google検索にいそしんでる皆様へ、淡い配色のuserstyleをお送りします。
目の疲れが少しでも癒されれば！
css: @-moz-document domain("google.com"), domain("google.co.jp"){body{color:#555}.kno-ecr-pt,._xdb .fl,._pk{color:#444!important}.kpbb,.kpbb:hover{background:-webkit-linear-gradient(top,#989898 0%,#898989 100%);background:-moz-linear-gradient(top,#989898 0%,#898989 100%);border:1px solid #a0a0a0}.sbfcn{border:1px solid #a0a0a0}.sfbgg,#fbar{background:#e0e0e0}#logo img,.csb,#hplogo{-webkit-filter:contrast(50%);-moz-filter:contrast(50%)}#viewport,#hdtb,#hdtbSum,#topabar,#top_nav,#cnt,._Fmb,._Fmb:hover,._Fmb.selected,._Fmb.selected:hover{background:#eaeaea!important}.mw a,._tX{color:#034b6d!important;text-decoration:none!important;transition:.2s all ease}.mw a:hover{color:#04769a!important}.mw a:visited,.sbpqs_a,.sbsb_i{color:#7f1660!important}.mw a:visited:hover{color:#9b2e79!important}cite{color:#657200!important}.action-menu .mn-dwn-arw{border-color:#657200 transparent!important}.sbib_a{background:#f8f8f8}.hdtb-msel{color:#a32424!important;border-bottom:2px solid #a32424!important}._OKe,.kp-blk,._zCd,._Rqb,._RJe,._LPe,._rhsvw,#lu_pinned_rhs{background:#dfdfdf!important;color:#555;box-shadow:none!important}#hdtbMenus{background:#e0e0e0}#cwmcwd,.cwtlwm,#wob_wc,.vk_c{background:#efefef!important;box-shadow:none!important}.vk_lgy span{color:#666}.sbdd_b{background:#cecece;box-shadow:none;border:1px solid #ccc}._Adb,.sbdd_b{color:#575757}.sbsb_a{background:#f7f7f7}._wD:hover{background:#f0f0f0}._mB{background:#d0880c}.vk_ard:after,.vk_aru:after{border-color:#ccc transparent!important}.vk_ard:before,.vk_aru:before{border-color:silver transparent!important}.vk_aru,.vk_ard{background:silver!important}._iH .fl{color:#f0f0f0!important;text-shadow:none!important}._iH .fl:hover{color:#f0f0f0!important;text-shadow:none!important}#_fVd,#_lid{border:none!important}}
